node.detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，1 月到巴基斯坦，6 月 8 日出現發燒及流鼻水，6 月 16 日返港，由檢疫中心送院，確診時沒有病徵。
node.detail_en: The patient has good past health and arrived in Pakistan in January. He started having a fever and runny nose on June 8. On June 16, he returned to Hong Kong and was sent to the hospital from the quarantine centre. At the time of diagnosis, he displayed no symptoms.

groups.description_zh: 疫情以來逾1,100人從巴基斯坦回港，當中33人確診，確診率接近3%，衛生防護中心指屬偏高水平。
groups.description_en: Residents stuck overseas have been steadily flying back to the city over the past few months, including 1,100 from Pakistan. So far 3% have tested positive for Covid-19, which the CHP called a “relatively high” rate compared with returnees from other countries.

node.remarks_zh: 1 月到巴基斯坦；6 月 8 日出現發燒及流鼻水
node.remarks_en: Travelled to Pakistan in Jan; developed fever and runny nose on Jun 8
